Thanks OP,

Consensus is this book might eventually get removed from your library because this seller (De Marque Inc.) is copyright infringing.

Still worth getting it.

I take no responsibility for the source of my above post: https://slickdeals.net/f/17674929-catch ... -ebook-1-0

IDStorms wrote: ↑ Thanks OP,

Consensus is this book might eventually get removed from your library because this seller (De Marque Inc.) is copyright infringing.

Still worth getting it.

I take no responsibility for the source of my above post: https://slickdeals.net/f/17674929-catch ... -ebook-1-0

Per the Amazon listing, they are the publisher, and that seems to be in sync with their website info. We'll see I guess.

Edit: Upon further investigation, it looks like the publisher is Horizon Ridge Publishing, and De Marque handles digital distribution for them. I still think it's legit.

OldVines wrote: ↑ Per the Amazon listing, they are the publisher, and that seems to be in sync with their website info. We'll see I guess.

Edit: Upon further investigation, it looks like the publisher is Horizon Ridge Publishing, and De Marque handles digital distribution for them. I still think it's legit.

I added it to my collection two days ago before there was talk about this issue, but I'm not overly concerned, and worst case, it gets revoked.

I think this was the first time my book purchase was not issued by Amazon which threw me off.
